legacy.full_text: Is the U.S.-Japan-South Korea trilateral mechanism going to end well for the two Asian nations? No. They strengthen the U.S. military's control over the region. But it makes them responsible for the mess should the U.S. pull back. They need to be looking out for themselves. https://t.co/WLgqgdINBQ
